com.xilinx.rapidwright.device

Class SLR

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.device.SLR

  • public class SLR
extends Object
    This class represents a super logic region, or a die within a device. This is really only relevant for devices with multiple dies as the device and SLR are equivalent for a single SLR.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Gets the ID or index of this SLR
      Tile getLowerRight()
      Gets the lower right most tile that belongs to this SLR.
      Tile getUpperLeft()
      Gets the upper left most tile that belongs to this SLR.
      boolean isMasterSLR()
      Checks if this SLR is the master SLR

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Gets the ID or index of this SLR

        Vivado Tcl:

        get_property SLR_INDEX $this

        Returns:
        The ID or index of this SLR
        Since:
        2018.2.0

      • isMasterSLR

        public boolean isMasterSLR()
        Checks if this SLR is the master SLR

        Vivado Tcl:

        get_property IS_MASTER $this

        Returns:
        True if this SLR is master, false otherwise.
        Since:
        2018.2.0

      • getUpperLeft

        public Tile getUpperLeft()
        Gets the upper left most tile that belongs to this SLR.

        Vivado Tcl:

        get_tiles -filter INDEX==[get_property MIN_TILE_INDEX $this]

        Returns:
        Upper left tile of this SLR.
        Since:
        2018.2.0

      • getLowerRight

        public Tile getLowerRight()
        Gets the lower right most tile that belongs to this SLR.

        Vivado Tcl:

        get_tiles -filter INDEX==[get_property MAX_TILE_INDEX $this]

        Returns:
        Lower right tile of this SLR.
        Since:
        2018.2.0
